TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 控制項的 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件以提供自訂的值從使用者指定的值轉換值的轉換儲存格所指定的型別屬性。Handle the event to provide custom value conversion from a user-specified value to a value in the type specified by the cell property. 當您處理事件，您可以自行轉換值，或您可以自訂預設轉換。When you handle the event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion. 例如，您可以將值轉換自己使用資料格使用類型轉換器，您所選擇的方法。For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell method with type converters of your choosing. 或者，您可以讓預設的類型轉換器剖析值，但修改， ，和屬性所傳回的物件屬性，使用儲存格初始化屬性。Alternately, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the , , and properties of the object returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 當您自行轉換值時，取代初始，其格式的值屬性之資料格所指定的型別轉換的值與屬性。When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell property. 若要指出不再剖析是必要，設定屬性`true`。To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the property to `true`. 此事件處理常式完成時，如果是`null`或不正確的型別，或屬性是`false`、使用資料格會剖析使用預設類型轉換器方法。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is parsed using the cell method with default type converters. 這個方法的預設實作會剖析值使用， ，和中傳遞的儲存格樣式屬性。The default implementation of this method parses the value using the , , and properties of the cell style passed in. 如果值不等於，這個值剖析使用中傳遞的屬性和型別轉換子。If the value is not equal to , the value is parsed using the property and the type converters passed in. 若要自訂的資料格的值轉換為格式化的值來顯示，處理事件。To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用檢查日期項目有效性。The following code example demonstrates using to check the validity of date entries. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以取得索引屬性。Use the property to obtain an index into the property of a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用探索的日期資料行是否已變更的資料格。The following code example demonstrates using to discover if the changed cell is in the date column. summary.span: 取得或設定編輯的儲存格所套用的樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style applied to the edited cell.

value.span: ，表示正在編輯的儲存格之目前樣式。

span.span: A that represents the current style of the cell being edited.

value.span: 預設值是儲存格 屬性的值。

span.span: The default value is the value of the cell property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷有效的格式儲存格。You can use this property to determine the formatting in effect for the cell. 設定這個屬性，或變更這個屬性會傳回物件的屬性沒有作用，除非已是`false`當事件處理常式會結束。Setting this property or changing the properties of the object that this property returns has no effect unless the is `false` when the event handler exits. 在此情況下， ， ，和的儲存格樣式屬性會用來剖析資料格的值。In this case, the , , and properties of the cell style are used to parse the cell value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#303](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#303)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#303](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#303)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出儲存格的值是否已經剖析成功。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a cell's value has been successfully parsed.

value.span: 如果儲存格的值已經剖析成功，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the cell's value has been successfully parsed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A設定是必要的屬性，指出是否已成功剖析新儲存格的值並繼續轉換。A sets the property to indicate whether the new cell value was successfully parsed and no further conversion is necessary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定至`true`儲存格的值會成功剖析。The following code example sets to `true` when the cell's value is successfully parsed. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#2)]
